question: Which cricket team has won the 2017 Ranji Trophy tournament?
explanation: Vidarbha has won the Ranji Trophy title for the first time by defeating Delhi in the final match. The final match was played at Holkar Stadium in Indore. During Ranji Trophy final match, Vidarbha's Rajneesh Gurbani took a hat-trick against Delhi. Vidarbha lost only one wicket and took only five overs to chase down the target which gave them their first Ranji Trophy title.
